response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and unique features, I am confident it will be a game-changer for you. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $11,000 for this exceptional product. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the opportunity to collaborate with you.", "product_price": 11000}
